Ömrümüzü verdik twmizide verdik bunaldık hatta ama sevdik be sevdik ulan pcmiz yoktu fpsimiz yoktu iyice kendine bağladı non steamda 30.000 saat den fazla gameplay im vardır sarıyolar güzel insanları tanıdık gördük zaman geçirdik ama artık o güzel insanlar kalmadı nokta.

Mira si no jugaste al 1.6 en el cyber te perdiste de mucho, pero no te preocupes por tus problemas de autismo, lo podes jugar online y conoces gente igual de autista que vos y por ahi conoces a una gordita que le guste el cs y otakus como vos y le pedis el whatsapp, le decis que la queres conocer en persona y la llevas al lugar mas recondito de tu barrio, y la re cagas a trompadas hasta que se desmaye despues la arrastras hasta tu casa de los pelos y ahi le rompes el orto a pijazos, la embarazas y le haces un aborto a patadas para demostrar tu estado de locura y de inconsiencia temporal, sos ininputable hermano, en 10 dias salis
Ооо, эта игра просто шедевр, я часто играл в неё в раннем детстве, это - легенда, пример того, какие шутеры должны выпускать сейчас))
Played it when my pc died on a potatoe. Still very good game
Игра которая переживёт все остальнфе части и останится популярной навеки! Ты всегда в наших сердцах.

Hello and Welcome.
On this inciteful review I shall provide the unknowledge one such as yourself information. This is a game. It is not very good. But regardless. It is a game.
My experience:
Woke up in a room with 4 people next to me, they look around and buy guns and so i follow their lead.
I bought the Avtomata Kalashnikova 47, or CV-47 the chinese budget verson which is 2,500 and not 2,700.
I walked down a corridor and got shot at so I ran back and cowered in the corner.
Then i proceeded to play Counter-Strike.
It was  a scary expierence.
Hangi yılda olursan ol yine oynanır <3
A very good game for his time.
